title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Learn the basics of computer science. This course will cover fundamental concepts such as algorithms, data structures, and programming languages.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Understand the fundamental data structures and algorithms. Topics include arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs.

title: Web Development
description: Learn how to build websites and web applications. This course covers HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React.
